nodes.documentation:
@title RFT full interface
This interface implementing functionality to create RFT token
that has Non-Fungible structure and its value is supplied with Fungible Token
(ERC-20 compatible)
nodes.name: IRFT
_createFT
mint
burn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns value of selected NFT
@param _tokenId - Unique identifier of NFT

ftHolderBalance
ftHoldersBalances

@param _tokenId - Unique identifier of NFT

attributes.documentation:
@title RFT full interface
This interface implementing functionality to create RFT token
that has Non-Fungible structure and its value is supplied with Fungible Token
(ERC-20 compatible)
attributes.name: IRFT
_createFT
mint
burn

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns value of selected NFT
@param _tokenId - Unique identifier of NFT
attributes.name: nftValue
ftHolderBalance
ftHoldersBalances

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns FT token holders amount of specified NFT
@param _tokenId - Unique identifier of NFT
attributes.name: ftHoldersCount

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns FT smart contract address of specified NFT
@param _tokenId - Unique identifier of NFT
attributes.name: ftAddress

approve(address,uint256).details: The zero address indicates there is no approved address.Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current NFT owner, or an authorized operator of the current owner.

balanceOf(address).details: NFTs assigned to the zero address are considered invalid, and this function throws for queries about the zero address.

params._owner: - An address for whom to query the balance

balanceOf(address).return: The number of NFTs owned by `_owner`, possibly zero

burn(address,uint256).details: Burn NFT and delete FT data

params._owner: - owner address of NFT to burn

ftAddress(uint256).details: Returns FT smart contract address of specified NFT

ftHolderBalance(uint256,address).details: Returns FT token balance of specified NFT

ftHoldersBalances(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Returns all FT token holders and their balances of specified NFT

params._indexFrom: - Start index inside array of token holders
params._indexTo: - End index inside array of token holders

ftHoldersCount(uint256).details: Returns FT token holders amount of specified NFT

getApproved(uint256).details: Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT

params._tokenId: - The NFT to find the approved address for

getApproved(uint256).return: The approved address for this NFT, or the zero address if there is none

params._operator: - The address that acts on behalf of the owner
params._owner: - The address that owns the NFTs

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if `_operator` is an approved operator for `_owner`, false otherwise

mint(string,string,uint256,address,uint2.details: Mint NFT token and create FT accordingly

name().details: Returns name of RFT Non-Fungible Token series

ownerOf(uint256).details: NFTs assigned to zero address are considered invalid, and queries about them do throw.
ownerOf(uint256).return: The address of the owner of the NFT

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. Throws if `_from` is not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT. When transfer is complete, this function checks if `_to` is a smart contract (code size > 0). If so, it calls `onERC721Received` on `_to` and throws if the return value is not `bytes4(keccak256("onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)"))`.

params._from: - The current owner of the NFT

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. Throws if `_from` is not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT. When transfer is complete, this function checks if `_to` is a smart contract (code size > 0). If so, it calls `onERC721Received` on `_to` and throws if the return value is not `bytes4(keccak256("onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)"))`.

params._data: - Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
params._from: - The current owner of the NFT

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Emits the ApprovalForAll event. The contract MUST allow multiple operators per owner.

params._approved: - True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: - Address to add to the set of authorized operators.

symbol().details: Returns symbol of RFT Non-Fungible Token series

tokenByIndex(uint256).details: Returns Non-Fungible Token unique identifier by it's index in array

tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).details: Returns owner of Non-Fungible token by it's index in array

params._index: - Index of Non-Fungible Token in NFT array

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns Unique Resource Identifier of RFT Non-Fungible Token

totalSupply().details: Returns total capacity of current NFT series

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. Throws if `_from` is not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT.

params._from: - The current owner of the NFT

devdoc.title: RFT full interface This interface implementing functionality to create RFT token that has Non-Fungible structure and its value is supplied with Fungible Token (ERC-20 compatible)

approve(address,uint256).notice: Set or reaffirm the approved address for an NFT

balanceOf(address).notice: Count all NFTs assigned to an owner

getApproved(uint256).notice: Get the approved address for a single NFT

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Query if an address is an authorized operator for another address

ownerOf(uint256).notice: Find the owner of an NFT

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers the ownership of an NFT from one address to another address
Transfers the ownership of an NFT from one address to another address

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of `msg.sender`'s assets.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer ownership of an NFT -- THE CALLER IS RESPONSIBLE TO CONFIRM THAT `_to` IS CAPABLE OF RECEIVING NFTS OR ELSE THEY MAY BE PERMANENTLY LOST
